rows.label: qev300271_MSG0001
rows.name:
Friend is brave BLADE who accepted that insane
request?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev300271_MSG0002
rows.name:
It no easy feat to gather 12,000 units of miranium!
Efforts of friend enough to bring this Nopon to tears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev300271_SEL0021
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev300271_MSG0004
rows.name:
Many thanks. Nopon still new at this miranium stuff,
but give us 500 years or so and friend can expect big
dividends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev300271_MSG0005
rows.name: Meh-meh! Friend should put more faith in Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev300271_MSG0006
rows.name: Huh? Friend not have 12,000 units? Give back tears![ST:wait ]
